IPTables



	
list rules

		ip6tables -L
		iptables -L


	
block

		
outgoing

			iptables -P OUTPUT DROP

			#
			#	allow one user
			#
			useradd -m -s /bin/bash communicator
			passwd communicator # EEC1234
			
			iptables -A OUTPUT -m owner --uid-owner communicator -j ACCEPT
			
			sudo -u communicator firefox
			
			
			#
			#	???
			#
			iptables -P INPUT DROP
			iptables -A INPUT -m owner --uid-owner communicator -j ACCEPT
			iptables -A INPUT -m owner --uid-owner communicator -j ACCEPT

			iptables -P FORWARD DROP

	
delete

		
	
		a chain rule by number:
			iptables -L -n --line-numbers
			iptables -D INPUT 1
			
			iptables -D FORWARD 7

	
flush

		a chain:
			iptables -F


	
save?

		mkdir -p  /etc/iptables
		iptables-save > /etc/iptables/rules.v4
		ip6tables-save > /etc/iptables/rules.v6
